Owned Network Service

NOTICE:

The namespace prefix http://cisco.com/jnap/ has been deprecated but is still supported. All JNAP clients should switch to the new namespace prefix http://linksys.com/jnap/.

Change History

Revision Date Notes
3.0.0 2022-09-19 Added service OwnedNetwork3, including the following:
  • action GetCloudIDs
  • action SetCloudIDs
2.0.0 2019-06-28 GetOwnedNetworkID now requires authentication.
Added service OwnedNetwork2 with action IsOwnedNetwork.

Services

OwnedNetwork

http://linksys.com/jnap/ownednetwork/OwnedNetwork
This service provides information about the "owned network" associated with the router.

Service Actions

  • ClearNetworkOwner
  • GetOwnedNetworkID
  • SetNetworkOwner

OwnedNetwork2

http://linksys.com/jnap/ownednetwork/OwnedNetwork2

Service Actions

  • ClearNetworkOwner
  • GetOwnedNetworkID
  • IsOwnedNetwork
  • SetNetworkOwner

OwnedNetwork3

http://linksys.com/jnap/ownednetwork/OwnedNetwork3

Service Actions

  • ClearNetworkOwner
  • GetCloudIDs
  • GetOwnedNetworkID
  • IsOwnedNetwork
  • SetCloudIDs
  • SetNetworkOwner

Actions

ClearNetworkOwner

http://linksys.com/jnap/ownednetwork/ClearNetworkOwner
This action removes the owned network association for the router, if one exists. If the router is not associated with an owned network, the action has no effect but does not return an error.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

This action does not have any input parameters.

Output Parameters

This action does not have any output parameters.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/ownednetwork/ClearNetworkOwnerResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
ErrorDisallowedRemoteCall This is being called remotely, which is not allowed
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/ownednetwork/ClearNetworkOwner"

{
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK"
}

GetCloudIDs

http://linksys.com/jnap/ownednetwork/GetCloudIDs
This action returns the account ID and group ID

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

This action does not have any input parameters.

Output Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
accountID string yes The account ID
groupID string yes The group ID

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/ownednetwork/GetCloudIDsResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/ownednetwork/GetCloudIDs"

{
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK",
  "output": {
    "accountID": "ACCOUNT_ID",
    "groupID": "GROUP_ID"
  }
}

GetOwnedNetworkID

http://linksys.com/jnap/ownednetwork/GetOwnedNetworkID
This action returns the unique ID of the owned network associated with the router.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

This action does not have any input parameters.

Output Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
ownedNetworkID string yes The unique ID of the owned network associated with the router. This value will be present if and only if the router is associated with an owned network.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/ownednetwork/GetOwnedNetworkIDResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/ownednetwork/GetOwnedNetworkID"

{
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK",
  "output": {
    "ownedNetworkID": "SAMPLE_NETWORK"
  }
}

IsOwnedNetwork

http://linksys.com/jnap/ownednetwork/IsOwnedNetwork
This action returns whether the router is associated to a cloud account.

Note:

This action does not require HTTP basic authentication.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

This action does not have any input parameters.

Output Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
isOwnedNetwork bool no Indicates whether the router is associated to a cloud account.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/ownednetwork/IsOwnedNetworkResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/ownednetwork/IsOwnedNetwork"

{
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK",
  "output": {
    "isOwnedNetwork": true
  }
}

}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK

Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK"
}

SetNetworkOwner

http://linksys.com/jnap/ownednetwork/SetNetworkOwner
This service allows a logged-in user to claim ownership of a router in order to establish an "owned network" which can interact with cloud-based features such as remote access. This action creates an "owned network" for the router and the logged-in user, and records information about the owned network in the cloud and in the router. This action can also be used to change the owned network associated with the router or reestablish the association if the router has been factory-reset.

Input Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
ownerSessionToken string no A session token belonging to the user who should become the owner. Note that this parameter is logically distinct from the session token that can be passed in the JNAP headers; the parameter is not used to authenticate the caller, but simply to identify the user who should become the network owner. The JNAP headers are used to authenticate the caller's permission to invoke the API at all.
friendlyName string yes The friendly name to associate with this network. If not set the router's hostname will be used. There are currently no explicitly defined restrictions on this value.

Output Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
ownedNetworkID string no The unique ID of the owned network associated with the router.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/ownednetwork/SetNetworkOwnerResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
ErrorCloudUnavailable The owned network cannot be created or associated with the router because the cloud service is currently unavailable.
ErrorUnknownOwnerSession The specified owner session token does not belong to any user or has expired.
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorDisallowedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/ownednetwork/SetNetworkOwner"

{
  "ownerSessionToken": "SAMPLE_SESSION_TOKEN",
  "friendlyName": "example string"
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK",
  "output": {
    "ownedNetworkID": "SAMPLE_NETWORK"
  }
}
